## defineCrudRepositoryClass() function

Create (define) a CRUD repository class for the given model.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function defineCrudRepositoryClass<M extends Model, R extends CrudRepository<M>>(modelClass: typeof Model & {
    prototype: M;
}, baseRepositoryClass: Constructor<R>): Constructor<R>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  modelClass | <code>typeof Model &amp; {</code><br/><code>    prototype: M;</code><br/><code>}</code> | A model class such as <code>Address</code>. |
|  baseRepositoryClass | <code>Constructor&lt;R&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Constructor<R>`

## Example


```ts
const AddressRepository = defineCrudRepositoryClass(Address);

```
